conversation.content: Great. Another supplier issue. Let me see here... order RF-2941?
Oh—uh, yes I've got that pulled up, RF-2941-QX from November 9th. I'm—sorry, it's been one of those days—so this was for, hmm, specialty flour?
Mm-hmm. Contaminated batch. Third time. Peak wedding season.
Woof, okay that's—er, let me check the supplier notes real quick. Shows here you ordered through vendor VND-8823, and they've had... oh wow, fourteen complaints this month alone.
Shocking. Truly. So what's the deal with my refund?
Right so—no wait, actually—I see they processed it but, uh, it got stuck in their system on the 14th at around 3:47 PM. Which is, hmm, frustrating I'm sure.
Hmm, what if... look, I've got twelve weddings. December weddings.
Oh gosh. Okay so—I mean, that changes things. Let me just—*sharp inhale*—alright, between you and me? I can push this through priority channel PRI-4492.
Wait. You can actually do that? I've been calling for days.
Well technically I'm supposed to wait for vendor approval but, er, given your situation and their track record... yeah I'm doing it. Should hit your account by tomorrow 9 AM Eastern.
Okay so that means... I can order from someone else tonight?
Exactly. And—actually wait, let me grab you something else. There's a code, uh... PEAK15, gives you fifteen percent off at supplier SUP-7761.
That's... huh. Okay. My clients are gonna kill me if these cakes fall through.
No no, we're not letting that happen. Your refund of $1,847.92 is processing now, transaction TXN-998214-B, and honestly? Vendor VND-8823 is getting flagged.
Let me see... December 4th, 7th, 9th... yeah I need flour by Monday.
Monday like—er, this Monday? *exhale* Okay so supplier SUP-7761 does next-day if you order before 11 PM tonight, ships from warehouse 445 Oak Street.
God. Yes. This Monday. Everything's just... it's a lot right now.
I totally—hmm, I get it. Look, I'm putting a note on your account ACC-5524-WK that you get priority support, so if anything goes wrong, we jump on it immediately.
That's actually... thank you. Really. You saved my business here.
Hey, that's what we—well, that's why I'm here. And um, good luck with those twelve weddings. That's, er... that's pretty incredible actually.
